verses.verse: לַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> everything זְמָ֑ן <WH2165> To every [thing there is] a season וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time לְכָל־ <WH3605> every חֵ֖פֶץ <WH2656> to every purpose תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> under the heaven ס

עֵ֥ת <WH6256> A time לָלֶ֖דֶת <WH3205> to be born וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> to die עֵ֣ת <WH6256> a time לָטַ֔עַת <WH5193> to plant וְעֵ֖ת <WH6256> and a time לַעֲק֥וֹר <WH6131> to pluck up נָטֽוּעַ׃ <WH5193> [that which is] planted

עֵ֤ת <WH6256> A time לַהֲרוֹג֙ <WH2026> to kill וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לִרְפּ֔וֹא <WH7495> to heal עֵ֥ת <WH6256> a time לִפְר֖וֹץ <WH6555> to break down וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> to build up

עֵ֤ת <WH6256> A time לִבְכּוֹת֙ <WH1058> to weep וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לִשְׂח֔וֹק <WH7832> to laugh עֵ֥ת <WH6256> a time סְפ֖וֹד <WH5594> to mourn וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time רְקֽוֹד׃ <WH7540> to dance

עֵ֚ת <WH6256> A time לְהַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> to cast away אֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> stones וְעֵ֖ת <WH6256> and a time כְּנ֣וֹס <WH3664> together אֲבָנִ֑ים <WH68> stones עֵ֣ת <WH6256> a time לַחֲב֔וֹק <WH2263> to embrace וְעֵ֖ת <WH6256> and a time לִרְחֹ֥ק <WH7368> to refrain מֵחַבֵּֽק׃ <WH2263> from embracing

עֵ֤ת <WH6256> A time לְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <WH1245> to get וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לְאַבֵּ֔ד <WH6> to lose עֵ֥ת <WH6256> a time לִשְׁמ֖וֹר <WH8104> to keep וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time לְהַשְׁלִֽיךְ׃ <WH7993> to cast away

עֵ֤ת <WH6256> A time לִקְר֙וֹעַ֙ <WH7167> to rend וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לִתְפּ֔וֹר <WH8609> to sew עֵ֥ת <WH6256> a time לַחֲשׁ֖וֹת <WH2814> to keep silence וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time לְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> to speak

עֵ֤ת <WH6256> A time לֶֽאֱהֹב֙ <WH157> to love וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and a time לִשְׂנֹ֔א <WH8130> to hate עֵ֥ת <WH6256> a time מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war וְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and a time שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> of peace ס
מַה־ <WH4100> What יִּתְרוֹן֙ <WH3504> What profit הָֽעוֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> hath he that worketh בַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> in that wherein ה֥וּא <WH1931> he עָמֵֽל׃ <WH6001> that labors

רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעִנְיָ֗ן <WH6045> the travail אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath given אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> which God לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of men לַעֲנ֥וֹת <WH6031> to be exercised בּֽוֹ׃

אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> everything עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> He hath made יָפֶ֣ה <WH3303> every [thing] beautiful בְעִתּ֑וֹ <WH6256> in his time גַּ֤ם <WH1571> has also אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָם֙ <WH5769> the world נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> also he hath set בְּלִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> in their heart מִבְּלִ֞י <WH1097> so that אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> can find out הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> no man אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֛ה <WH4639> the work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> maketh הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> that God מֵרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> from the beginning וְעַד־ <WH5704> even סֽוֹף׃ <WH5490> to the end

יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֵ֥ין <WH369> there ט֖וֹב <WH2896> that [there is] no good בָּ֑ם כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo לִשְׂמ֔וֹחַ <WH8055> in them but for [a man] to rejoice וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> and to do ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good בְּחַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> in his life

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> moreover כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> And also that every man שֶׁיֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> should eat וְשָׁתָ֔ה <WH8354> and drink וְרָאָ֥ה <WH7200> and enjoy ט֖וֹב <WH2896> the good בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָל֑וֹ <WH5999> of all his labour מַתַּ֥ת <WH4991> it [is] the gift אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> I

יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּ֠י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> doeth הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> that whatsoever God ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will remain לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> it shall be for ever עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and אֵ֣ין <WH369> nothing לְהוֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> can be put וּמִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at אֵ֣ין <WH369> is nothing לִגְרֹ֑עַ <WH1639> to it nor any thing taken וְהָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> from it and God עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> doeth שֶׁיִּֽרְא֖וּ <WH3372> [it] that [men] should fear מִלְּפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

מַה־ <WH4100> is has שֶּֽׁהָיָה֙ <WH1961> been כְּבָ֣ר <WH3528> That which hath been is now ה֔וּא <WH1931> and that וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> been כְּבָ֣ר <WH3528> and that which is to be hath already הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> been וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> been and God יְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> requireth אֶת־ <WH853> נִרְדָּֽף׃ <WH7291> that which is past

וְע֥וֹד <WH5750> Furthermore רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> And moreover I saw תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun מְק֤וֹם <WH4725> the place הַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> of judgment שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> there הָרֶ֔שַׁע <WH7562> [that] wickedness וּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> [was] there and the place הַצֶּ֖דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness שָׁ֥מָּה <WH8033> there הָרָֽשַׁע׃ <WH7562> [that] iniquity

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <WH559> I said אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בְּלִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in mine heart אֶת־ <WH853> הַצַּדִּיק֙ <WH6662> the righteous וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> and the wicked יִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <WH8199> shall judge הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֵ֣ת <WH6256> for [there is] a time לְכָל־ <WH3605> every חֵ֔פֶץ <WH2656> there for every purpose וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and for כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH4639> and for every work שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> is there

אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <WH559> I said אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בְּלִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in mine heart עַל־ <WH5921> and דִּבְרַת֙ <WH1700> concerning the estate בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons הָאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men לְבָרָ֖ם <WH1305> might manifest הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> that God וְלִרְא֕וֹת <WH7200> them and that they might see שְׁהֶם־ <WH1992> that they בְּהֵמָ֥ה <WH929> themselves are beasts הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For מִקְרֶ֨ה <WH4745> For that which befalleth בְֽנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons הָאָדָ֜ם <WH120> of men וּמִקְרֶ֣ה <WH4745> befalleth הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> beasts וּמִקְרֶ֤ה <WH4745> befalleth אֶחָד֙ <WH259> even one thing לָהֶ֔ם כְּמ֥וֹת <WH4194> them as the one dieth זֶה֙ <WH2088> the other כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so מ֣וֹת <WH4194> so dieth זֶ֔ה <WH2088> the other וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> breath אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> yea they have all one לַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> all וּמוֹתַ֨ר <WH4195> hath no preeminence הָאָדָ֤ם <WH120> so that a man מִן־ <WH4480> over הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> above a beast אָ֔יִן <WH369> and there כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> for all הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> for all [is] vanity

הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> All הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> All go אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> unto one הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> All הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came מִן־ <WH4480> from הֶֽעָפָ֔ר <WH6083> all are of the dust וְהַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all שָׁ֥ב <WH7725> again אֶל־ <WH413> to הֶעָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> to dust

מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יוֹדֵ֗עַ <WH3045> Who knoweth ר֚וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted הָאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man הָעֹלָ֥ה <WH5927> that goeth הִ֖יא <WH1931> he לְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> upward וְר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> and the spirit הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> of the beast הַיֹּרֶ֥דֶת <WH3381> that goeth הִ֖יא <WH1931> he לְמַ֥טָּה <WH4295> downward לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> I

וְרָאִ֗יתִי <WH7200> Wherefore I perceive כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֵ֥ין <WH369> nothing טוֹב֙ <WH2896> that [there is] nothing better מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִשְׂמַ֤ח <WH8055> should rejoice הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> than that a man בְּֽמַעֲשָׂ֔יו <WH4639> in his own works כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֖וּא <WH1931> that חֶלְק֑וֹ <WH2506> for that [is] his portion כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֤י <WH4310> who יְבִיאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH935> for who shall bring לִרְא֔וֹת <WH7200> him to see בְּמֶ֖ה <WH4100> what שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will occur אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> what shall be after
